name: health-server
description: nodo heath para el envio de informacion del sistema

scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production pm2 start health-station.js -f --interpreter babel-node --name station && pm2 logs station
scripts.start-prod-no-log: NODE_ENV=production pm2 start health-station.js -f --interpreter babel-node --name station

author: toth.cl
